Merging Parameters¶

This involves CLASSIX’s merging parameters.

classix.agglomerate(data, splist, radius, method='distance', scale=1.5)¶

Implement CLASSIX’s merging with disjoint-set data structure, default choice for the merging.

classix.merging.scc_agglomerate(splist, radius=0.5, scale=1.5, n_jobs=- 1)¶

Implement CLASSIX’s merging with strongly connected components finding algorithm in undirected graph.

classix.merging.minimum_spanning_tree_agglomerate(splist, radius=0.5, scale=1.5)¶

Implement CLASSIX’s merging with minimum spanning tree clustering.
